answer: Bright Data proxies are known for their high-speed performance. They maintain a large pool of residential and datacenter proxies with optimized routing to ensure minimal latency. Most users report response times under 100ms for datacenter proxies and 200-300ms for residential proxies.

Bright Data offers flexible pricing plans based on bandwidth usage and proxy type. Their pricing is on the higher end but reflects the quality and reliability of their service. Plans typically start around $500/month for basic usage, with enterprise plans available for larger scale operations.

Oxylabs provides fast and reliable proxy services with excellent performance metrics. Their datacenter proxies typically achieve sub-100ms response times, while residential proxies average 150-250ms depending on geographic location. They have a robust infrastructure designed for high-speed data collection.

Smartproxy offers excellent IP rotation capabilities with both sticky and rotating session options. You can configure rotation intervals from 1 minute to 24 hours, or use session-based rotation. Their rotation system ensures clean IPs and helps avoid detection.
bullets: Flexible rotation intervals (1 min to 24 hours)
Supports both sticky and rotating sessions

answer: ScrapeOps provides comprehensive geographic targeting options. You can select proxies from specific countries, regions, or cities. Their geo-targeting works seamlessly with both datacenter and residential proxies, allowing you to target over 195 countries with precise location control.

Oxylabs pricing is competitive and scales with usage. Entry-level plans start around $300/month, making it more affordable than some premium providers. They offer transparent pricing with no hidden fees and provide discounts for annual commitments.

Smartproxy delivers good speed performance with datacenter proxies averaging 80-120ms and residential proxies at 200-400ms. While not the fastest in the market, they provide a good balance of speed, reliability, and cost-effectiveness for most use cases.

ScrapeOps proxies offer solid speed performance optimized for web scraping workloads. Datacenter proxies typically respond in 100-150ms, while residential proxies average 250-350ms. Their infrastructure is designed to handle high-volume scraping efficiently.

Bright Data is known for exceptional reliability with a 99.9% uptime SLA. They maintain redundant infrastructure across multiple data centers and have robust failover mechanisms. Their residential proxy network is one of the largest and most stable in the industry.

Smartproxy offers solid geographic targeting capabilities with support for 195+ countries. You can target specific countries or regions, and their system automatically routes requests through appropriate proxy locations. City-level targeting is available for major markets.
